# Routechoices.com - Live GPS Tracking Solution

Routechoices.com is a live GPS tracking SaaS platform for orienteering and outdoor events.

## Revolutionize Your Events

Set up your club effortlessly with our intuitive user interface and start live GPS tracking your training sessions or competitions instantly. Our solution enables coaches, friends, and spectators to follow participants, whether they use dedicated GPS trackers or smartphones with our free app, in real-time from any device with a web browser.

Routechoices.com live GPS tracking offers a multitude of benefits, including rapid analysis for the coaching staff, enhanced entertainment for the public, and increased safety for the runners.

After the event, replay the action as many times as you want and take advantage of advanced features like simulating virtual mass starts from any point on your map.

Additionally, our integrated, privacy-friendly analytics tool provides valuable insights into who visits your pages.

## For all your events, no matter the size...

Since 2019, Routechoices.com has proudly hosted thousands of events of all sizes, ranging from intimate personal training sessions to large-scale international gatherings. Our state-of-the-art server, located in Finland, is finely tuned to handle events with hundreds of participants and thousands of online viewers from around the globe.

What sets us apart from the competition? Our software stack incorporates advanced techniques that enhance performance and reliability. We utilize aggressive caching and the latest compression technologies for both data and images. We've even developed our own WMS map tile server, ensuring that you only download the specific map sections you need while viewing a live event.

With Routechoices.com, you can trust that our live pages will load quickly, regardless of your network quality. Experience the future of event tracking—effortlessly and efficiently!

## Track Your Journey with Customizable and High-Quality Maps

Discover the ultimate flexibility in live GPS tracking with our platform. Whether you're an adventurer, professional, or hobbyist, you can choose the perfect map to suit your needs. Use your own maps for a fully personalized experience, or take advantage of our extensive selection of high-quality background maps.

Access renowned options like MapAnt, detailed topographical maps available for several countries, ideal for outdoor enthusiasts. Need precision in the UK? Switch to the British Ordnance Survey Maps, known for their unmatched accuracy and depth.

Our platform puts you in control, letting you combine cutting-edge GPS tracking with maps tailored to your activities. Navigate with confidence and clarity—anywhere, anytime.

## Extensive API for Developers

Routechoices.com offer an API that can be used by developers to extend what can be done with the GPS data.

[API Documentation](https://api.routechoices.com/)
